TextBlock.Text: <color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: A note to all those who wish to enter the laboratory.
RESEIRCHA: Due to certain Nomai invading my space and disturbing me while conducting tests, this door will not open unless primed with an energy source.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: ...and you still owe me a new warp core!
